messages.messageBody:
I came across the following list (link below) in Secrets of the Samurai
/Ratti & Westbrook/Castle Books/isbn: 0785810730
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/ryu.htm


But the question is: Do men really want to go to the Takeda School of
Swimming?

Shy student: "But Sensei, I can't take off my fundoshi in front of
everyone."

Takeda: "But you must or I can't show you the 'secret technique'."


--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
The Blog-- http://barbarasheridan.blogspot.com/
